channel.title: Problem with 508's and 525's [JVM_BIND]
channel.description:
Problem with 508's and 525's [JVM_BIND]
Hello,
Every time i try to run a 508 or 525 i get this error:
java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(Unknown Source) at net.com.codeusa.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketLi stener.java:41) at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:58) Press any key to continue. . .
I have Re-installed java a few times, Didn't work.
Can someone help me please?
ps the problem may be that the port is in use if so, then how do i close it? plz tell me how to solve this!!!

item.title: Problem with 508's and 525's [JVM_BIND]
item.dc:creator: @kakren2 kakren2
item.description:
@kakren2 wrote:

Problem with 508’s and 525’s [JVM_BIND]

Hello,

Every time i try to run a 508 or 525 i get this error:

java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source)
at net.com.codeusa.net.SocketListener.(SocketLi stener.java:41)
at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:58)
Press any key to continue. . .

I have Re-installed java a few times, Didn’t work.

Can someone help me please?

ps the problem may be that the port is in use if so, then how do i close it? plz tell me how to solve this!!!

Read full topic
